<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"> <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access>package_private</access> <active>true</active> <api_name>global.compare2Previous</api_name> <caller_access/> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <description>The function that calls the actual comparison code.</description> <name>compare2Previous</name> <script><![CDATA[compare2Previous = function() { var DH = new DiffHelper(); var gr = DH.compareRecord(current.sys_id, current.getTableName()); if (gr != null) action.setRedirectURL(gr.getTableName() + ".do?sys_id=" + gr.sys_id + "&sysparm_stack=" + current.getTableName() + ".do?sys_id=" + current.sys_id);
}]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>aleck.lin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2010-07-29 23:04:13</sys_created_on> <sys_id>207221140a0a0be86cb09a3681f34285</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>compare2Previous</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="System Diagnostics" source="com.glide.ui.diagnostics">32a63c643cb1311068bcf327dfe37f43</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_207221140a0a0be86cb09a3681f34285</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>aleck.lin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2010-07-29 23:19:34</sys_updated_on> </sys_script_include> </record_update>
